name: Poor Stickman
description:
This poor Stickman is attached and can not deliver himself! Unfortunately for him the freedom will certainly be even more painful!

To free him you will have to reflect and make the right choices.

Do you feel able to finish all levels and deliver this poor Stickman?



Features:

■ 50 different levels!
■ Addictive!
■ Original decor!
■ Relaxing gameplay!
